Broccoli is a rich source of vitamins and minerals, including vitamin C, vitamin K, folate, and potassium. It is also a good source of dietary fiber and contains phytonutrients that may have health benefits.
Broccoli is a nutritious vegetable that is high in fiber, vitamin C, vitamin K, iron, and potassium. It also contains antioxidants and is thought to have anti-inflammatory properties.
